modName: Arkris store the ultimate shop plus daedric follower
summary: Arkris store adds a new shop to whiterun located behind arcadias cauldren, the shop has two merchants one upstairs selling rare items the one downstairs selling food and ingridients both have 10,000 gold.Also including crimson nirnroot and the books explaining about crimson nirnroot,the upstairs merchant has loads of rare items including daedric ar
descriptionHtml:
Arkris store adds a new shop to whiterun located behind arcadias cauldren, the shop has two merchants one upstairs selling rare items the one downstairs selling food and ingridients both have 10,000 gold.Also including crimson nirnroot and the books explaining about crimson nirnroot,the upstairs merchant has loads of rare items including daedric artifacts and dragon priest masks.Dragon bones and scales plus the skeleton key and much more with loads of armor and weapons and clothes, also the shop has all the crafting tables searchable barrels and sacks. A mystery chest plus a locked room downstairs with three locked chests containing loads of items from both merchants,also added a daedric follower to the shop. He is level 50 and armed with daedric weapons.
UPDATE added new armor (enchanted and higher armor value)to follower, to equip it take it from him then give it back to him and he will equip it.Also changed vendors trading hours to 24 hours a day.
author: dragonrend73
